page.title: 20Health Care in Aboyne
page.content:
{Health:} Aboyne{Health Centre}and{Hospital}are situated at the east side of Aboyne. The centre has 3 full time{doctors}and a physiotherapist. Surgery opens at 8.30 am and closes at 5.30 pm, Monday to Friday. Saturdays are left free for emergencies. The hospital is used mainly by the elderly.
This Domesday Survey was compiled by the following pupils of Aboyne Academy:
Julie Parkin, Julie Hall, Marlene Coutts, Sarah A. Butterworth, Magnus Graham, Euan Cruickshank, Melvyn Esson, Neil Maitland, Sally Lloyd and Hazel Dinnie.
